title: This is how Indian Illegal immigrants enter USA. Sick mentality.
selftext: Mostly people from the northern belt (Punjab, Haryana, Gujurat) take this illegal route. Just search "Donkey Process" on YouTube and you'll find hundreds of videos related to this topic. This guy has an entire channel revolving around this topic. Vlogs and stuff. And people in the comment are congratulating and wishing him luck lmao. I can't wrap my head around it
